Musician Nanarin:
I must admit that his broad shoulders take my breath away, and that lovely beard of his captured my soul :
What can I do? I've never felt this way before: Could you please help me?
"I will help you."
Could you perhaps find out what would make him happy? I love Barbado: Please ask his friends what he wants the most. Start with the Dwarves in the village, and don't you dare mention my name!
Will you please do this for me?
